'''Eric Mandel''' is a physical therapist who worked with Owen after his car accident.

==History==
After Owen's accident, he was supposed to do physical therapy. Eric came into his room to start this with him, but Owen refused to do as Eric asked, insisting that he just needed to do his own gym routine.

==Career==
He is a physical therapist at [[Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital]]

==Notes and Trivia==
*He was the third physical therapist to work with Owen.
